summary: A young boy grows up as he embarks on a quest to become a knight.
cast: Freddie Highmore|Antonio Banderas|James Cosmo|Charles Dance|Tamsin Egerton|Rupert Everett|Barry Humphries|Alfred Molina|Mark Strong|David Walliams|Julie Walters|Olivia Williams|Saoirse Ronan|Michael Culkin|Richard O'Brien|Lloyd Hutchinson|Stephen Hughes|Matt Wilkinson|Nigel Lambert|Tayler Marshall|James 'Jimmy' O'Brien|Niab Nathaniel|Stephen Marcus|Keith Wickbam
title: Justin y la espada del valor
